    • Method Detail

      • computeSurfaceObject

        public double computeSurfaceObject(ij.ImagePlus imagePlusInput,
                          double label)
        Scan of image and if the voxel belong to theobject of interest, looking, if in his neighborhood there are voxel value == 0 then it is a boundary voxel. Adding the surface of the face of the voxel frontier, which are in contact with the background of the image, to the surface total.
        Parameters:
        imagePlusInput - segmented image
        label - label of the interest object
        Returns:
        the surface

      • computeVolumeofAllObjects

        Parameters:
        imagePlusInput - segmented image
        Returns:
        double table which contain the volume of each image object
